text:
Saad El-Din Rafik Al-Hariri (; born 18 April 1970) is a Lebanese politician. He was the 33rd Prime Minister of Lebanon from December 2016 to January 2020. He was also the Prime Minister from November 2009 to June 2011.
On 29 October 2019, amid the 2019 Lebanese protests, Hariri announced his resignation, and that of his cabinet.
